Uses of Package
org.sibermatica.lang.text

Packages that use org.sibermatica.lang.text
Package
Description
org.sibermatica.lang
Provides highly reusable static utility methods, chiefly concerned with adding value to the java.lang classes.
org.sibermatica.lang.text
Provides classes for handling and manipulating text, partly as an extension to java.text.
  • Classes in org.sibermatica.lang.text used by org.sibermatica.lang
    Class
    Description
    StrBuilder
    Deprecated.
    As of 3.6, use Apache Commons Text TextStringBuilder instead
